pageContent: Introduction: We reviewed physical activity (PA) studies in prostate cancer (PC) survivors investigating (a) the effects of PA on health outcomes, (b) the prevalence of PA, and (c) the determinants of PA.

metaData.source:
Trends in the Use of Stereotactic Body Radiotherapy for Treatment of Prostate Cancer in the United States
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32022878/
